additional description: Studies dialects across the united states. Data gathered from Xeno-Canto
description:
The first cross-corpus dataset that focuses on dialects in bird vocalisations.
The DB3V comprises more than 25 hours of audio recordings from 10 bird species
distributed across three distinct regions in the contiguous United States
(CONUS).
name: DB3V
species: Agelaius phoeniceus, Cardinalis cardinalis, Certhia americana, Corvus brachyrhynchos, Molothrus ater, Setophaga aestiva, Setophaga ruticilla, Spinus tristis, Tringa semipalmata, Turdus migratorius
